exceptions.tactic: assert (Un_cv (fun k => x^k / INR (fact k)) 0) as Hcv by (apply (cv_speed_pow_fact x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

ctx: assert (Un_cv (fun k => m_infty^k / INR (fact k)) 0) as Hcv by (apply (cv_speed_pow_fact m_infty)).
exceptions.tactic: apply (infinite_sum (fun k => x^k / INR (fact k)) (exp x) n Hcv).
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

original: intros H. assert (Un_cv (fun k => x^k / INR (fact k)) 0) as Hcv by (apply (cv_speed_pow_fact x)). apply (infinite_sum (fun k => x^k / INR (fact k)) (exp x) n Hcv).
